docs.text: Kanjiclub API documentation Overview HTTP requests are formatted like this: METHOD /url/to/endpoint : Description request response If no response is defined, then the generic response is used Endpoints /api/accounts /api/stats /api/lessons /api/practice Generic response A generic response only signifies a status using HTTP status codes, without a JSON body.
docs.title: Kanjiclub API documentation

docs.text: HTTP requests are formatted like this: METHOD /url/to/endpoint : Description request response If no response is defined, then the generic response is used
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: A generic response only signifies a status using HTTP status codes, without a JSON body.
docs.title: Generic response

docs.text: Accounts API POST /api/accounts/new : Create new account { "email": "", "username": "", "password": "" } POST /api/accounts/login : Log in { "user": "", "password": "" } { "token": "" } GET /api/accounts/me : Info about myself { "token": "", "username": "", "email": "" }
docs.title: Accounts API

docs.text: Lessons API GET /api/lessons : Get all lessons { "lessons": [ LessonInfo ] } POST /api/lessons/new : Create new lesson { "name": "" } { "id": "" } POST /api/lessons/{lessonId}/import : Import vocabulary into lesson Direct upload of binary vocab data LessonInfo Object { "id": "", "name": "", "createDate": "", "size": 0 }
docs.title: Lessons API

docs.text: Direct upload of binary vocab data
docs.title: POST /api/lessons/{lessonId}/import: Import vocabulary into lesson

docs.text: Practice API POST /api/practice/new : New practice { "lessons": [ String ] } { "words": [ WordInfo ] } POST /api/practice/complete : On practice completed { "words": [ { "wordId": "", "correct": false } ] } Generic response
docs.title: Practice API

docs.text: Stats API GET /api/stats : Stats overview { "streak": 0, "strong": 0, "medium": 0, "weak": 0 } GET /api/stats/{wordStrength} : Retrieve all words with that strength { "words": [ WordInfo ] }
docs.title: Stats API
GET /api/stats/{wordStrength}: Retrieve all words with that strength

docs.text: Words API GET /api/words/{lessonId} : Get words in lesson { "words": [ WordInfo ] } POST /api/words/{lessonId}/new : New word in lesson Send WordInfo PUT /api/words/{lessonId}/{wordId} : Update word in lesson Send WordInfo with only the values that should be changed WordInfo Object { "id": "", "createdOn": "", "lastPracticed": "", "strength": "weak", "content": { "native": "", "kana": "", "kanji": "", "comment": "" } } WordStrength weak medium strong
docs.title: Words API

docs.text: Send WordInfo with only the values that should be changed
docs.title: PUT /api/words/{lessonId}/{wordId}: Update word in lesson
